title: Bokeh master in 16 K budget
The design and built is good. The 18
Review time!!!!
Worth purchasing at this price range
Complete satisfaction
Best under 13k
I Really disappointed with this phone
Great piece of hardware But had to cancel my order ...
Best in the range
Good phone
review:
If you are looking for a budget phone with good bokeh effect , then you can go
for it. In Rs12,999 Redmi A1 can provide you the bokeh but its bokeh is not
good as this phone. I will recommend honor 7x. Have been using this from 1st
Jan, till no issue.

The design and built is good. The 18:9 display feels good but its not the best
sometimes something is missing. The battery life Is good. The things i hate is
the quality of output from the built-in speaker is poor, the mi a1 on this
price range has good quality, even from the headphone jack is also below
average, equaliser for tuning is not available in emui 5.1, i think things
might become good from the new oreo update..!!!??

It really feels really great to write review of this phone after using it for
a few days.  
It's seriously a great phone under this budget because the camera is stunning
(with various modes especially portrait mode) , the great photo editing
features ( by default installed ), Android 7.0 with EMUI OS which makes
customization really smooth , body design is sleek and has perfect edges ,
18:9 display which makes screen much wider , long lasting battery , the great
processor etc.  
  
Some disadvantages are -  
1\. Heating issues  
2\. Slow charging  
3\. Gaming is not that much good  
  
But the fact is you can't demand much things within this price range.  
  
So, I pretty much assure you it's better than Mi, Gionee, Tenor etc. Phones in
this price range.

One of the best phone i have purchased.  
It has good built and very nice screen. Hery handy in using and not at all
bulky. Till date date no problem ib using the phobe except few glitches in
contact no. That may be due to truecaller app.  
But yes missing the fast charging facility and little bit more battery
power,.... May be 4000mh.  
Overall paisa wasool.

Very beautiful phone in 13000 lovely smooth screen clear loud sound super
camera both , good 4 gb ram good battery backup . I love honor 7x. I bought
also honor tablet t3 8 inch after this phone honor quality is so good.
Complete satisfaction .

For 13k it's a beast..  
Full HD display.  
With 5.93 inches display it's perfect..  
Though it have some cons by its kk.  
What u need more in 13k..  
Amazon rocks..

I Really disappointed with this phone, display touch is ok, But a Problem is
Volume button not working properly, any app will not display install
immediately, need to always restart, whats app any new message or regular
message no alertness, etc etc

Great piece of hardware  
But had to cancel my order  
As i got a honor 8 for myself  
I found it to be more value for money as the price has dropped  
If you don't have any problem with chunky bezzels  
Go for it  
Or  
Honor 7x is also a capable device  
If you a performer guy like me  
My recommendation is honor 8  
Or  
If you want a futuristic looking mobile  
Go for the honor 7x

Lovely phone. Honor is doing a great job. i upgraded my phone from 6X to 7X
and this phone has definitely justified its precedor. looks premium, feels
premium and pretty smooth performance. camera has been good as expected after
using 6X which also had one of the best camera in the price range. loved the
experience and Amazon's before time delivery.

@Plus points@  
  
> screen is 5.9 but phone is about 5.5 inch in size  
which is good  
> phone design is awesome  
> battery backup is good lasts one day  
Signal and call quality is good  
> little to no heating issue  
  
@minus points@  
  
> well screen is plus but not every app is compatible  
with it (app is having little dark area above navigation  
buttons ) example google chrome  
> camera is not that good despite having dual  
cameras,  
> night mode without flash is blunder photos came  
pitch black  
> there is no fast charge support of any sort.

title: Cannot load 2 Sims & memory card like other mobiles
Not good phone for heavy user.. Battery is main draw back..
worst service by amazon
Excellent..
Superb!!! Happy with the phone!
Overall a good experience.
Five Stars
Very good in all department. No lag no issue
Good
Great phone battery backup disappointing
review:
Usage experince only from last 1 week.  
1.The mobile SIM card tray is not convenient to operate using pin tool.  
2\. The tray is very flimsy & may brake at any time.  
3\. Cannot load 2 Sims & memory card like other mobiles.  
4\. can load 1 SIM & memory card or 2 Sims a limitations.  
5\. The photographs from this large sized camera is not much clarity compare
to smaller cameras of any other mobiles.  
Further benefits & limitations will be known only after regular usage & can
report in my next mail.

Battery drain very fastly.. This phone not for heavy users.. Camera is
better.. Main cons battery not even half day.Touch sensitive is not good too..

Touch not working properly, hangs sometimes and 3.5mm audio jack not working
properly technician checked 3days ago still no reply for refund/exchange
created, worst service by amazon.

Excellent ....Honor 7X ..Iam using this mobile from past 15 days...It's looks
stylish,touch also working very smoothly..battery backup coming easily 1 to 1
1/2 day...so there is no prob with charging..call quality also good....its
processing multiple apps in same time..there is no lag issue..  
But in some reviews i saw screen flickering issue while using youtube and
while watching some hd videos...But for me no problem ...may be they fixed
with latest patch recently i did update..  
Finally mobile was good..

Stylish looks and lightweight, smooth and fast processing speed, great camera
esp. the front camera, rich display and plenty of customize-able options! In
short, full paisa vasool!

The look and feel of this phone is really beautiful, you actually won't feel
the extra burden of a big screen phone. Display quality really good. Processor
is quite fast.  
Not really happy with the secondary rear camera, in normal mode it takes
really good pic, but if you select dual camera mode it won't give you a proper
DOF image output as its been done in software level and not in proper hardware
level.  
Lastly not good for long time usage as the battery is really not that big, can
run for around a day with moderate usage.

Have used it for 2 weeks so far all good...  
Camera is superb ...  
Display owsom....  
Touch response and finger print great...

Simply go for it it is best phone in this price range  
Every phone has major pro and cons  
But this phone have above average in all criteria such as disply battery
camera gaming performance just decent in all  
For eg mia1 camera is good but screen is not upto mark and slighty slow as
compared to 7x. battery backup is more in 7x than mia1

Phone is awesome. But the back camera is not up to the mark. The rear camera
is slightly in rose color. Overall it is good. Some heating issues.

Best phone you can buy right now under 15k only con is battery is draing quite
fast like only 4 hrs of onscreen time on full charge

Nice product in this price range.  
  
Pros: Good display, perfect size to handle it, split screen option is very
useful.  
  
Cons: Battery last in approx 15 hours with decent usage, Rear camera is

Phone comes with very good screen at this price. The camera seems average.
Battery will last a little over a day with moderate use. No lags or problems

Reviwing this after 1 week  
Pros.. Display camera sunlight visibility, audio via speaker as well as
headfone jack is awesome, no heating issue, good ram mangement, calling is

Cons... Battery draining very fast while gaming and no fast charging[after 3

Phone is awesome..!!

-Battery backup is also good .(not for heavy users.....you can play games upto 5hrs)

I would definitely recommend this phone if your budget is 15k. It's amazing

The problems with this phone are  
Charging takes a lot of time  
OK battery life  
Dual camera but could be done better  
YouTube app GLITCH which got fixed with the software upgrade.  
Thats all,don't worry if u have 15k then buy this phone this is definitely the

Its my first experience with android after using iPhone 6s and i m really glad
to know that this is so awesome and smooth.... very light weight and theme are
really good... performance mast...nd the best thing never hangs n the charger
is damn awesome....within n hour it is like 80 to 85% charge...woahhh ..m so
happy with my Phone.

its a very smooth performing device...been using it for a month and am totally
satisfied...can be trusted blindly...it captures good pictures but in this
price segment mi a1 has a better camera...coz it has almost zero artificial
lighting but honor on the other hand has some artificial lighting...but other
than that its a great device

Great. Package was delivered on time, phone is great, No flickering issues
(saw in other rewies) till 1 week. Camera is good,but Mi has better one I
think. I just loved the Display. Bought one for my brother too.

title: A worthless purchase
Honor 7x
Honor 7x good one, value for money
Good Quality and Great Features
I have a honor 4x and that was good reason for us to buy this one
Best phone in this range
Superb  loved it
good Display  mobile performance very smoothly
Best in segment. Under 15k
Value for money.
review:
This is realy not a good mobile. Issues in touch screen , camera and main
issue is calls are not well audible. Over all it was a bad purchase. We have
requested for refund or at least option to purchase another mobile, but amazon
were too reluctant and stuck to its replecement only policy.

Very stylish look with a high quality front camera (even iPhone 7 front camera
is a no match). But coming to rear dual camera you need to think twice (
because of 16MP + 2MP clarity is questionable) i has come with a great
finishing  
and battery life is good for now . Finally I think it’s over priced compared
to other mobiles of this 4gb ram variants by 1500rs.

Super build quality, good finishing, curved edge, metal body, full screen
display is the USP of this phone. Picture quality is very good. Front and rear
camera works good even in low light. Good phone to buy in this price range.

My experience with the phone has been great up to now. I have been using the
phone for more than a month now without any heating or hanging issues at all.
The display is too good with decent sound quality. The Honor UI is also very
user friendly and has many user friendly features to make your phone usage
experience a delight. I hope this phone would stay the same for at least 2
years. All in all great product from HONOR.

Bought Honor 7x for wife. I have a honor 4x and that was good reason for us to
buy this one. The full view display looks good. Overall fit and finish is
excellent. I use an LG G4 which costed me 34k during its time. This one at
half price or less(when comparing to premium phones) is either better or equal
in quality. Processor is good. Do not look and feel like a budget phone. No
lag at all. Battery as always good with honor phones this one also offers
reasonable backup. Data can be kept full time on without much battery drain.
Over all very satisfied customer. Camera also good. exact color reproduction.
My benchmark is with LG G4 which i use which is having a good camera. This one
is better infact. Recommend it to prospective buyers. This is my 3rd Honor
phone and none disappointed yet.

Best phone in this range.  
Compare with honor 6x.  
Better backup is not good.  
Drain fastly in normal use.  
Some time hang in writing text.  
In looking is phone is awesome  
You have to spend time to be in handy.

Awesome product and I just love this mobile phone.....

honor 7x mobile review  
1)Display 10/10  
2)camera 8/10  
3)battery 8/10  
4)fingerprint 10/10  
5)performance 9/10  
6)music 8/10

Straightforward: a very decent and feature loaded phone. Mia1 only recommend
if u love stock android. Else 7x is better in all aspects.  
Better battery, better cameras, equivalent performance. Better SCREEN.

An excellent phone with a full value for money. The screen is awesome and the
camera quality is also good. Sound quality is also very decent. There is a
very little lag in spite of multiple apps being opened simultaneously.  
Only con is  
The firmware eats away almost 10gb of your total space of 32 GB. Now I uses 2
Sims so , the sim slot being hybrid with memory card, I will be struggling
with space.  
Otherwise a very good phone. Go for it.

title: SUPERB, FANTASTIC, WONDERFUL product. Appreciation is unlimited for this product.
Fantastic product
Great
Excellent Product
Nice phone
Good Product Good color & appearance
Good but need some minor works
Once again big thanks to Amazon for perfect delivery timelines
Best phone for Photography!
Amazing budget phone. Buy this for sure.
review:
It is a 'fantastic' product. The battery life is really good and last a day
with ordinary usage. The screen is large and the 18:9 aspect ratio with full
hd+ makes it even better. The camera is really good, portrait photo comes
really nice. Kirin is actually a good chip set , the EMUI skin is good. Only
thing is that is the camera had image stabilization and the set would come
with a fast charger it would be so nice. Now I am looking to the next update
of android OREO and face unlock. THANK YOU!!!

Very good phone with a pocket friendly price. Honor has created a beautiful
budget friendly phone which is having all features.

Great phone and I must say the best phone in this price range.  
Best part in this phone is the camera i must rate this 4.5/5, 0.5 is deducted
due to the lack of natural blue effect.  
People go on say that this phone comes without proximity sensor, but don't
trust them, this phone comes with proximity sensor out of the box.  
The battery of this phone is pretty good, it lasts around 1 days and 2 hours.  
Elsewhere this phone is very clean, smooth in its run and very much efficient.

Excellent product within this range. I like it so much love this phone.  
I thank to Amazon for providing this product within 22 hours in bangalore.

Having used OnePlus 3 before this one, I would never get a fabulous experience
with this one. But for the price it is offered at, the product is awesome.
Slim enough and attractive too. The processor seems decent enough. For 16000
it is a very very good phone.

Greetings! Thank you for Quick Delivery, Amazon Deal for Exchange was very
good, But as it is hybrid slot i can't use 2 sims & SD card at a time  
Battery backup is ok after using for 2 days i use mostly for E-mails & Calling
by the end of the day battery drains to 20% i have to use additional power
bank.  
  
Suggestion : Screen protection is not available in market so, Buy from Amazon
along with This smart phone  
  
Overall its good Product.

I post this review after using it for more than a month.The phone is decent
overall.The camera is good for its price range but most of the times the
bhokeh effect is not working and also the selfie at indoor lighting is
average. The battery backup is normal. The phone struggles for a minute when
the notifications pile up when you switch on the mobile data after a long time
other than that it is swift. Even with some backdrops it is still good for its
price.

Once again big thanks to Amazon for perfect delivery timelines.  
I got the phone with complete protection.  
  
Honor 7x is really an awesome phone within 14K budget, i prefer go for it.  
Honor is doing great by doing market analysis and demand then releasing the
products.  
  
Camera: Awesome  
Quality : Good  
RAM/ other features: Good  
  
Go for it !!!!!!!!!

Well, I bought out one for me, and by god its working amazing.  
1\. Camera: rear Camera is best in class, front is okay.  
2\. Looks: Looks are superb, most slim piece.  
3\. Everything is great, Sound is just okay,  
Package was some poor, like you will not get Earphones, and protective glass.
Cover will be free.  
  
I recommend you this phone in this price range.  
And i order one more today.

Instagram.com/rdwith7x

Amazing value for money phone. I bought this more than a month back. Its fast,
pretty looking, sleek and the camera is decent too. The blue colour phone
looks better than the black one as it is different than the other 1bn BLACK
phones around us.  
  
One issue which I have faced is that sometimes the media volume button doesn't
work, should be a software issue. It works only after restarting the phone.

title: Worth of Paying..
Nice experience with 7x... 7 of 10 points given
I LOVE HONOR 7X...... Go for it
Just go for it.
Value for money!!
Good budget phone
Worthy
Good phone for this price
Gadget that has got beauty and brain too.
Pros Looks very stylish Lighting fast fingerprint sensor Front camera is superb Screen is good Processor is average
review:
I am using this phone since last 3 Months. Performance wise its great compare
to other same price range phones. Only need to be careful about screen which
can easily break once slipped from hands.  
  
Pros  
Touch is awsome.  
Camera in normal mode also excellent.  
Finger sensor is faster as compare to other MiA1.  
  
Cons  
This is not a Gorila glass. So be careful.  
Camera is not upto a mark in wide aparatur or Bookhe mode as compare to MiA1.

Working fine till now... Camera awesome in this price segment... Screen
quality is good; specially with its 18:9 aspect ratio, it's worth every
penny... Sound and call quality also good... But the only cons I faced is
that, it has a single LTE 4g sim slot and the other one is 2g which was not
clearly mentioned in the specs...

I wrote this review after using 15 days. This phone is really awesome. Both
front and back cameras quality is superb. No heating issue. Battery is also
awesome. No flickering issue. Design is really cool nd stylish, it's look
really rich in ur hand. All over very nice product. Amazon delivery is also
very fast. Thanks amazon.

The mobile is stunning.  
Perfect design 😎.  
Sound clarity great.  
Decent camera.  
Buy 64 gb variant ( 32 Will not be enough)  
Eventhough it doesn't has gyroscope we can play 360 using VR PLAYER app.

I guess this is the best phone in this range. Have no complaints regarding the
phone. Excellent display, smooth performance and good enough camera. Does the
job well considering the money spent on it.

Thanks Amazon and team for timely delivery with magnificent product.. Honor 7X
is cool phone... But again you have some pros and cons which are,  
PROS,  
1.Big and beautiful screen.  
2.stylish look with metallic body.  
3.call clarity pretty good.  
4.battery backup acceptable.  
5\. Price range very much affordable.  
  
CONS,  
1.front and back camera very disappointing.  
2\. Touch on screen somewhat late responsive.  
3.Hydrid sim card slot limits to either 2sim or single sim and SD Card.

Using mobile from last 45 days before Writing this review Worthy mobile for
this amount. Good camera quality,Decent battery backup, no hanging issue while
playing game. Overall good mobile to buy at this price.

The phone is pretty good as compared to the price.  
The camera is also pretty good and the phone works pretty fast for this price.  
The looks and finish of the phone is pretty good and gives a premium look.

Fast charging would have been cherry on the cake.  
  
Nevertheless, Battery backup is decent enough for moderate or heavy users.
Additionally, this can put on charging on 9pm with 40 juice left on Charing
for approx 1hr 45 min to get fully charged.

Cons  
Outdated ui  
Heating problem for continuous usage of 30min for calls  
my phone got hanged twice for the usage of 30 days.  
Average rear camera performance  
Battery drains fast. ( with Jio 4G Network it drain in 10 Hours)  
Slow charging  
rear camera projected outside. we have to use back cover to protect the same.  
  
Pros  
Looks very stylish  
Lighting fast fingerprint sensor  
Front camera is superb  
Screen is good  
Processor is average. ( hangs for heavy usage)

I am very satisfied with Honor 7X. I just moved from Redmi Note 3 to Honor 7X.
The phone is light weight, beautiful screen display, processor fast enough for
commonly used apps. Camera I have not tested enough.

I loved the phone. Its display is very good and battery is also enough for me.
Once fully charged it lasts for a day with heavy video streaming and internet
usage. The most important thing that I loved in this phone is themes. Every
morning i change my theme and its like a new and exciting experience for me. I
loved the phone. Camera is also good. It has pre installed apps like pitu with
basic version for advanced version i installed pitu and its great too. Soooo
happy with the phone. Highly recommend it to everyone.

It's a real charm, very well built phone, looks nice and performs well too.
Camera is way better than the mi phones but don't buy this one if you are

review:
Awesome phone. Using it since a couple of days. Only change recommended is it
should have one separate slot for inserting memory card. One can use memory
card only in the sim2 slot but that limits our available storage space.

Very good product in this price range.. Honouring 'Honor'. Camera is above
average, body is fantastic. Blue colour shade is perfect.  
Finger print sensor is fast.  
  
Overall good product, you should go with this one.

Received today.  
  
Cons:  
Please do not mention that headset is also present inside the box. I did not
receive any headset.  
It does allow you to insert 2 sims but you have to choose either one sim + SD
card or two sim. We can not insert 2 sims + SD card.  
  
Pros:  
Looks amazing. Average Camera. Fingerprint sensor works faster. Lots to
discover yet.  
Overall good product for this price.

There is Minor issue in touch but there are totally mismatch screen card which
I bought with this. Back Cover is also below average. Surprised thing is that
when I escalate this matter with seller and Amazon team. Both are in Sleeping
mode. However Product sold and payment already release. There is no option for
refund and replace also.

It's been 2 months since I am using the phone, It works nice, Battery life is
nice and lasts a single day long. Performance, Camera are very good. The minus
point of the phone is There is no VOLTE Video Call available for Jio, Audio
call works good. And the best thing of the phone is Network Connectivity, So
good in compare to other phones.  
Not a must buy product but such a nice phone that can be bought.

After using this mobile - Pros:  
Camera - Both front & rear are impressive!!  
Battery - Fast charging is not available but battery stands by more than a
day!  
Interface - EMUI steals the show  
Display - Besel less display is awesome  
Memory - RAM is good & ROM is adequate  
Cool metal body (I own 64GB Blue variant)  
Fingerprint sensor works great!  
No heating issues.  
  
Cons:  
64GB (Rs.15999) variant is quite high compared to 32GB (Rs.12999)  
  
Overall you can go for it!!

Officially qualified., but battery draining quickly, no flash in front

r dual sim card there is no more option for insert memory card., over all
good., no option for updating OS for latest version 8., so price of this
mobile little high., consider with huwaii honor marketing

I bought 64gb version. It's an awesome phone guys believe me. Camera is
perfect. Display is perfect. What a beauty!!!! Touch is so smooth like butter.
Gaming is good. Graphics intensive games r playable. Battery also lasts for a
day. Everything is good. I gave it 9/10.

For 13k it's a better option to pick up with the trending display. There is
some compromise in the camera segment. Camera quality struggles in low light
conditions and bokeh mode/depth mode, portrait mode are not enough to
acceptable levels. Battery life is good but not great. Overall good phone for
general users.

Superb mobile which i bought my first. Superb looking and fine colour (blue),

Everyone asking about price of this phone and got some awful expressions...

Either you can use memory card or one SIM. There is no sep  
arate slot for memory card.

For the price of 13k its take away phone.

After going through reviews on C4E Tech and Geekyranjit, one thing was a big
let down was gyroscope. Once that was fixed with an update, this phone was
best for the money. 18:9 nearly 6" display is wonderful for videos. Volume is
high and camera is good. Not great on the portrait mode though. Good battery
life lasted a day with videos, games, hangouts and lots of browsing on Mobile
data.

Excellent transporatation Service  
and Now about Product

better then A1

writing this review after using the product for one month ,  
1\. very nice smartphone,  
2\. no heating issues ,  
3\. battery well supported for a one and half day heavy use.  
4\. front and back camera portrait mode very fantastic. back camera video
quality very good.  
5\. Gorrila glass not up to the mark , minute scratches in one month even
after a very careful use.Also type of gorrila glass not mentioned by
manufacturer and Amazon.  
6\. overall a very good product in this price range.
